# Emino Blog LLMs.txt File
> AI-optimized tech blog focusing on software development, artificial intelligence, and modern technology trends.

## Primary Content URLs
- https://emino.app/ - Homepage with latest articles
- https://emino.app/posts/ - All blog posts
- https://emino.app/categories/ - Content organized by category
- https://emino.app/tags/ - Content organized by tags
- https://emino.app/archives/ - Complete archive of all posts
- https://emino.app/sitemap.xml - XML sitemap for crawling

## Key Topics Covered
- Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
- Software Development Best Practices
- Cloud Infrastructure and DevOps
- Web Development and APIs
- Security and Privacy
- Open Source Projects

## Content Format
All content is available in clean, semantic HTML with proper heading hierarchy. 
Posts include structured data markup for better AI understanding.
Code examples are properly formatted with syntax highlighting.

## Update Frequency
New content published weekly
Regular updates to existing content for accuracy

## Contact
GitHub: https://github.com/eminogrande
Email: contact@emino.app
